entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning near midnight then changing to flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
